title: Longhorns Daily News : Texas AD Chris Del Conte catches ride from fan , again , to another big Longhorn postseason contest
body_text:
Remember that time Texas Longhorns athletic director Chris del Conte’s flight was canceled, so he had to catch a ride with a Texas fan all the way to Milwaukee to catch last season’s men’s basketball team face the Virginia Tech Hokies in the NCAA Tournament?
Longhorns Daily News: Texas AD Chris Del Conte catches ride from fan, again, to another big Longhorns’ postseason contest
Plus: Damn, this weekend is huge
Welp, del Conte is at it again. This time, thanks for Texas’ marketing geniuses.
(Notably, modern airlines still suck.)
